alert.note: Alert for Eastern Preston; Eastern Tucker; Preston; Western Tucker (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 10:31PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT TUCKER AND SOUTHEASTERN PRESTON COUNTIES THROUGH 1100 PM EDT... At 1030 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Terra Alta to 6 miles southeast of Hendricks. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kingwood, Parsons, Terra Alta, Davis, Thomas, Rowlesburg, Hendricks, Hambleton, Albright, Elk, Canaan Valley State Park, Aurora, Davisville, Cortland, Red Creek, Laneville, Canaan Hgts, Elgon, Benbush, and Lead Mine. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Preston; Eastern Tucker; Preston; Western Tucker
